dublinCore.dc:title: 102 HR 3209 RH: I–27 Numbering Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Arrington (for himself, Mr. Cuellar, Mr. Pfluger, and Mr. Jackson of Texas) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
Additional sponsors: Ms. Leger Fernandez, Mr. Nehls, and Mr. Gooden of Texas
Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
action.action-instruction: Strike out all after the enacting clause and insert the part printed in italic
For text of introduced bill, see copy of bill as introduced on May 11, 2023

form.official-title: To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to designate the Texas and New Mexico portions of the future Interstate-designated segments of the Port-to-Plains Corridor as Interstate Route 27, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the I–27 Numbering Act of 2023.

subsection.text: Section 1105(e)(5)(C)(i) of the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 (Public Law 102–240) is amended by inserting The routes referred to in clause (i) (other than subclauses (V)(aa) and (V)(bb) and subclause (IX)(aa) of that clause) and clause (iv) of subsection (c)(38)(A) are designated as Interstate Route I–27. The route referred to in subsection (c)(38)(A)(i)(V)(aa) is designated as Interstate Route I–27E. The route referred to in subsection (c)(38)(A)(i)(V)(bb) is designated as Interstate Route I–27W. The route referred to in subsection (c)(38)(A)(i)(IX)(aa) is designated as Interstate Route I–127N. before The route referred to in subsection (c)(45).
Section 1105(c)(38)(A)(i) of the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 (Public Law 102–240) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking Lamesa, the Corridor and inserting the following:
in item (aa) (as so redesignated), by striking 87 and, the Corridor and inserting the following:
by striking (IX) United States Route 287 and inserting the following:
in item (aa) (as so redesignated), by striking Oklahoma, and also United States Route 87 and inserting the following:

endorsement.action-desc: Reported with an amendment, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed
